name: Pigeon Post (Manisha W, RiccardOliva)
description:
Made in approximately 4.5 hours for the Trijam #134.  The theme was "Package Delivered"

Help Postman Pigeon deliver the correct packages to the houses using the stamp!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move (movement is grid-based, so tapping is suggested)

Instructions:

Go to the post office to get a package and deliver it to the correct house using the colour of the stamp. Passing by a house of the wrong color means it was a long delivery! How many packages can you deliver before your shift ends?

Credits:

Manisha - Programming

Riccardo Oliva - Music and Sound

Keisha - Art
